A weapon that fires bullets. Can be charged with
up to 9 bullets in its circular chamber.
\C[3]A card with Keymaster written on it.
It reads: "This is a key to the exit.
You will die if someone learns of this card."
\C[3]The door to the kitchen is shut fast.
\C[3]A stopper at the bottom of the bath. Small and heavy.
